description.p: Discidia is the constellation of pain, granting the user a bump in their attacks, as well as making them more of a dangerous attacker.
When you choose this attunement at 3rd level, from now on you may double your Strength or Dexterity damage bonus on proficient weapons whenever you strike.

sheet.description: From now on you may double your Strength or Dexterity damage bonus on proficient weapons whenever you strike.

description.p: Starting at 6th level, you may add an additional damage die to your proficient weapons.

sheet.description: You may add an additional damage die to your proficient weapons.

description.p: Starting at 9th level, your distance with ranged and thrown weapons is increased by half of the original range.

sheet.description: Your distance with ranged and thrown weapons is increased by half of the original range.

description.p: Starting at 13th level, each time you take damage as a reaction, roll a d20. On a 19 or 20, half the damage you took gets reflected back at the opponent.

description.p: Starting at 17th level, you are a master of striking your enemy. Each time you strike with your proficient weapon, the enemy has vulnerability applied (Immune makes an enemy resistant, resistant makes an enemy take flat damage, no resistance makes an enemy vulnerable, a vulnerable enemy cannot be more vulnerable) from the weapon's damage type.
